title: PM expresses displeasure at overpricing of daily commodities in Balochistan
content:
ISLAMABAD, April 22 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif during his visit to Balochistan province on Saturday will also review implementation of a special relief package announced for the holy month of Ramazan.
Expressing his displeasure at the overpricing of daily commodities and lack of its supply in the province, the prime minister directed the federal minister for industries and national food security to immediately reach the province.
He said that selling of daily use items at high price other than fixed by the official price rates was a crime which would not be tolerated at any cost, PM Office Media Wing, in a press release on Friday, quoted the prime minister as saying.
Upon the direction of prime minister, a special Ramazan relief package was announced two days back.
